video.title: Van Helsing
video.synopsis: After three years in a coma, Vanessa awakens to a world ravaged by vampires. Now, she and a motley band of fellow survivors fight to stay alive.

episodes.synopsis: Waking from a coma, Vanessa finds lone soldier Axel protecting her from a vampire apocalypse called "The Rising" and discovers she has unusual powers.
episodes.title: Help Me

episodes.synopsis: Three years before her awakening, Vanessa is a single mom in Seattle when a volcanic eruption and a rash of killings signal the start of "The Rising."
episodes.title: Seen You

episodes.synopsis: When their UV light source is damaged, Vanessa and Axel must scavenge outside for parts. Flesh reveals the truth about Vanessa to his former comrades.
episodes.title: Stay Inside

episodes.synopsis: Searching for their lost loved ones, Vanessa and Mohamad sneak out of the hospital, while Doc and Axel discover that a suicide is not what it appears.
episodes.title: Coming Back

episodes.synopsis: Captured by vampire leader Julius, a surprised Vanessa finds a familiar face in his flock. New arrivals at the hospital wrest control away from Axel.
episodes.title: Fear Her

episodes.synopsis: While Vanessa and Susan attempt to escape from Julius through underground tunnels, the schism widens between two groups of survivors at the hospital.
episodes.title: Nothing Matters

episodes.synopsis: Opposing forces under Julius and Dmitri clash during a siege of the hospital while the remaining survivors consider permanently leaving the facility.
episodes.title: For Me

episodes.synopsis: Mohamad tries to stay alive and catch up to the survivors who are following Axel to his former military base, only to find the site abandoned.
episodes.title: Little Thing

episodes.synopsis: Trapped in an underground lab called "The Farm," the group encounters a feral vampire and deadly radiation while Mohamad makes a friend on the road.
episodes.title: Help Out

episodes.synopsis: After suffering a grievous loss, Vanessa and the survivors find comfort at Eden, a seemingly peaceful human community that conceals a dark bargain.
episodes.title: Stay Away

episodes.synopsis: Taking refuge at Susan's childhood home, the survivors face a shocking revelation about a member of the group while Julius begins tracking Vanessa.
episodes.title: Last Time

episodes.synopsis: Traveling to a vampire-controlled camp, Vanessa and Mohamad are trailed by an increasingly dangerous Sam, while Julius and Dmitri meet face to face.
episodes.title: He's Coming

episodes.synopsis: Revelations, betrayals and reversals are in store for everyone when Vanessa becomes a captive of Dmitri, whose rule is not as ironclad as he believes.
episodes.title: It Begins

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa's long-awaited reunion with Dylan isn't what she dreamed it would be. A barely alive Dmitri flees, while others meet a final reckoning.
episodes.title: Began Again

episodes.synopsis: Mohamad rescues Vanessa and Dylan, who then have a fateful clash with Julius. Two long-lost survivors reunite, but neither are who they once were.
episodes.title: In Redemption

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa's attempts to keep Dylan alive force her to make a series of wrenching choices. A mysterious vampire assails a group of juvenile delinquents.
episodes.title: Love Bites

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa and Julius are rescued from a skinners' camp by a band of survivors living in the forest. Sam takes Felix, one of the delinquents, captive.
episodes.title: A Home

episodes.synopsis: After a vengeful Sam massacres a camp full of children, Vanessa goes on the warpath trying to find him, leading to a brutal and bloody confrontation.
episodes.title: Save Yourself

episodes.synopsis: As Dmitri takes extraordinary steps to rebuild his forces, visions lead Vanessa back to a secret base where lost memories of her childhood resurface.
episodes.title: Veritas Vincit

episodes.synopsis: Dmitri's connection to Vanessa's mysterious past is revealed, while Scab recruits troops for his new master. Axel's return to normal is death-defying.
episodes.title: Everything Changes

episodes.synopsis: Searching for Vanessa, her group encounters a fortress of suspiciously friendly police officers. Flesh and Lucky seek Mohamad but find Dmitri's army.
episodes.title: Big Mama

episodes.synopsis: Dmitri closes in on Doc and Julius while Axel and Scarlett hide from the Sisters. Scarlett's past as a vampire hunter-in-training is revealed.
episodes.title: Wakey, Wakey

episodes.synopsis: In a remote mountain laboratory, Vanessa awakens to find a secret program underway to create a cure for vampirism -- and she's the next test subject.
episodes.title: Base Pair

episodes.synopsis: Sam's traumatic childhood is revealed in flashbacks while he forces a human prisoner to treat Mohamad, who is near death from his grievous wounds.
episodes.title: Be True

episodes.synopsis: The splintered group converges at the sanctuary of Crooked Falls, but new behaviors displayed by a pack of ferals alert them to a growing danger.
episodes.title: Crooked Falls

episodes.synopsis: Scarlett and an ally from Crooked Falls penetrate the mountain tomb of the Elder, but Dmitri is two steps ahead of them in freeing the ancient evil.
episodes.title: Black Days

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa and Scarlett suffer a loss but gain an oath of fealty from the First Elder. Julius and the others are held hostage by Harrison and his troops.
episodes.title: Fresh Tendrils

episodes.synopsis: Seeking its lost totem, the First Elder leads Vanessa, Scarlett and Axel to a decaying former insane asylum that's linked to a Van Helsing ancestor.
episodes.title: Super Unknown

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa is transported into the life of her ancestor Lily Van Helsing in colonial Hong Kong, where she fights the B'ah, another vampire Elder.
episodes.title: I Alive

episodes.synopsis: After they become daywalkers, Ivory and Scab return to the Sisterhood to find it in ruins. Sam's visions lead him to begin training a worthy protg.
episodes.title: Rusty Cage

episodes.synopsis: Doc, Jolene, Julius and Flesh settle into new lives in Denver. Vanessa, Scarlett and Axel arrive in San Francisco searching for the Second Elder.
episodes.title: Pretty Noose

episodes.synopsis: The Denver contingent learns the rules of life in the safe zone -- along with some disturbing secrets. Vanessa prepares for a showdown.
episodes.title: Like Suicide

episodes.synopsis: Trapped underground, Mohamad has a vision that leads him to freedom. Axel takes a band of survivors to Denver. The Sisterhood become daywalkers.
episodes.title: Hunted Down

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa and Scarlett follow a map to an island where the Third Elder is entombed, but their quarry's identity unexpectedly causes them to hesitate.
episodes.title: Crooked Steps

episodes.synopsis: To force Doc to continue her research, Denver officials arrest Jolene. Axel gets his crew safely to the city just as Ivory and the Sisterhood attack.
episodes.title: Loud Love

episodes.synopsis: Ensnared in a gruesome trap, Vanessa is visited by the ghosts of her past, who force her to reckon with the dark impulses growing inside her.
episodes.title: Outside World

episodes.synopsis: Axel returns to his hometown, where he finds a familiar face among the survivors fighting a band of daywalkers. Sam embarks on a search for Mohamad.
episodes.title: Been Away

episodes.synopsis: Axel is reunited with Scarlett, but after he's blinded while fighting daywalkers, they seek help from a mysterious man living alone in the wilderness.
episodes.title: Christ Pose

episodes.synopsis: The paths of Vanessa, Scarlett, Axel, Mohamad and Sam converge in a gruesome confrontation between light and darkness that claims several casualties.
episodes.title: Birth Ritual

episodes.synopsis: After heavy losses, Vanessa escapes with Lily. Doc and Julius are captured by Blak-Tek. Transformed into the Fourth Elder, Sam works with the Oracle.
episodes.title: Dark Destiny

episodes.synopsis: Julius trains Hansen's daughter, Violet, and discovers she has hidden powers. Vanessa saves a band of survivors led by Jack, a fierce teenage girl.
episodes.title: Dark Ties

episodes.synopsis: Axel forges an alliance with a hip hedonist named Max, who is really the cruel warden of a prison camp where Flesh and Jolene have been captured.
episodes.title: Love Less

episodes.synopsis: Vanessa vows to use her abilities only for good, but a vengeful Axel tracks her down. Sam and the Oracle team with the Sisters to resurrect Michaela.
episodes.title: Broken Promises

episodes.synopsis: Hansen reveals the truth about Violet to a party of visitors to Blak-Tek: Sam, the Oracle and Michaela. Axel plots to break Flesh out of Max's prison.
episodes.title: Liberty or Death

episodes.synopsis: Axel and Phil undertake an epic journey into the Badlands on the trail of a desperate Max, who has kidnapped Phil's wife, Jennifer, and her son, Owen.
episodes.title: Miles and Miles

episodes.synopsis: United by their common bloodline and shared visions, Vanessa, Violet and Jack team up for a showdown against Sam, the Oracle, and the Dark One.
episodes.title: Metamorphosis

episodes.synopsis: Violet encounters an old friend while on the run. The Oracle tortures Jack for information. Hansen's secret past as a Van Helsing acolyte is revealed.
episodes.title: The Prism

episodes.synopsis: A harrowing flashback reveals that Jack was separated from Violet and their father during a school archery team trip when the Rising occurred.
episodes.title: No 'I' in Team

episodes.synopsis: Captured and forced to fight in a gladiator-style broadcast, Violet and Julius battle Scab and Ivory with help from a newly united Axel and Jack.
episodes.title: Together Forever

episodes.synopsis: Violet, Julius and Axel travel to Fort Collins seeking pages missing from the Van Helsing book while Jack and Ivory disrupt a Sisters ceremony.
episodes.title: All Apologies

episodes.synopsis: Aided by a skeptical Col. Nicholson, the group traps the Oracle, but she takes revenge on Hansen. Jack and Violet open a portal to the Dark Realm.
episodes.title: Three Pages

episodes.synopsis: Axel and Julius accompany Nicholson to the mysterious Sunshine Unit looking for Doc. In the Dark Realm, Dracula plots her return to the real world.
episodes.title: The Beholder
